summary: Its a small fortress type mansion south of Riverwood called Hoddiin. Its perfect for defending yourself and has gates at both sides of the road.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Hoddiin - Riverwood Home[/b]
Its a small fortress type mansion south of Riverwood called Hoddiin (pronounced as Hohdiin, oh as in dova and iin as in kiin). Its perfect for defending yourself and has gates at both sides of the road.Â 
[b]
Features[/b]
[list][*][size=2]Walls around the house and yard[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Forge and smelter[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Grindstone, Tanning rack and Workbench[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Alchemy lab and arcane enchanter[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Bed[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Storage[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Cooking gear[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]All shrines including nocturnal[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Training dummys[/size][/*]
[/list][b]
Purchaseable upgrades[/b]
[list][*][size=2]Bard and house: Rava[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Smith and house: Thonro[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]General merchant: Bormir[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Food merchant: Dunvar[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]wizard type merchant and house: Dorma[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Gaurd in the form of friendly giants[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
[/size][size=2][b]Banner
[list][*][size=2]Companions[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Thieves guild[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Dark brotherhood[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Imperial[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Stormcloacks[/size][/*]
[/list][/b][/size]
[youtube]wEnUrEajmZU[/youtube]
author: Lexthatguy
